name: IG Gold
description: IGGalaxy is a next-gen social competitive gaming and esports platform, powered by the Polygon (previously Matic) network. In the first year of early beta, IGGalaxy has exceeded 150k sign ups, 1k tournaments, 10 esport titles and $100k+ in prizes! Through gamification and our innovative application of blockchain technology, we will truly redefine esports. IGGalaxy exists to reduce the widening gap between the casual and professional competitive gaming ecosystems. IG Gold (IGG) is the operational token required in IGGalaxy, used to drive value exchange between market participants to form a token economy for content, social competitive gaming and esports. IGG is required for a range of use cases, from payment of smart contract obligations and paid platform features. Using Polygon's scalable technology, we can ensure efficient exchange of value. This allows us to bring together the key stakeholders of our esports token economy in new and exciting ways.
